value.caption: Slow RC Oscillator as sampling clock
value.name: VAL_0x01

value.caption: Comparator Enabled. Regular Current Counter counts up if Accumulated Current is above threshold and is reset if Accumulated Current is below threshold.
value.name: VAL_0x01

value.caption: Comparator Enabled. Regular Current Counter counts up if Accumulated Current is above threshold and down if Accumulated Current is below threshold.
value.name: VAL_0x02

value.caption: Current source on PI pin enabled
value.name: VAL_0x01

value.name: VAL_0x02

value.caption: Current source on both PI/NI pins enabled
value.name: VAL_0x03

bitfield.name: LID

bitfield.name: LAINC

bitfield.caption: FIFO LIN Data Buffer Index bits
bitfield.name: LINDX

bitfield.caption: When this bit is written logic one, the digital input buffer of the corresponding V_ADC pin is disabled.
